Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Foster. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Foster.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Cermak
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, King Dr., 26th and Michigan due to street blockage near Michigan/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, King Dr., 26th and Michigan due to street blockage near Michigan/Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near LSD/47th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage, and Pershing due to, street blockage near LSD/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage, and Pershing due to, street blockage near LSD/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at Rhodes/31st
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 33rd, King Drive, and 31st due to, street blockage at Rhodes/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Rhodes, 33rd, King Drive, and 31st due to, street blockage at Rhodes/31st.

Allow extra travel time.
